content:
So, I removed myself from highfive for the time being. Coming out of the all hands, it's pretty clear that there are a lot of balls that need juggling -- I hope not for super long -- and that if I'm going to do that, I can't also be reviewing PRs. I also have a fair number of PRs assigned to me. I will try to drain that queue and/or reassign.

I think we should probably think about whether/how to track PRs that need reviewing a bit more team-wide.
